results.name: The unique primitive prime factor of 2^n-1 for the n in A161508.
comment: For these primes p, the binary expansion of 1/p has a unique period length. The binary analog of A007615.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..100
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Jun 17 2009
